arts.sum: Inter Milan secured a vital 2-0 victory away to Cagliari in Serie A, with goals from Lautaro Martinez and Pio Esposito. arts.sum: Lautaro Martinez returned to the scoresheet as Inter Milan beat Cagliari 2-0 at the Unipol Domus.
